title: Korčula Neolithic Site
description: A submerged neolithic site on a former islet connected to the east coast of Korcula island, just southeast of the modern town and port of the same name. Preliminary underwater excavations conducted by a team from the University of Zadar were reported in the media in 2021. Stone walls, ceramics, and tools were among the finds.

properties.description: Central point determined through examination of Google Earth imagery, following photographs and description in Reuters 2021-06. Dates after excavator as quoted by Reuters.
properties.title: Imagery Location of Korčula Neolithic Cite
